snippet.title: The Forgotten City - Release window Trailer
snippet.description:
This summer a travel in time awaits you with The Forgotten City by Modern Storyteller

Immerse yourself in this narrative game where your actions may save (or not!) the faith of the city.
Will you be able to save the city and break the Golden Rule?

The fate of the city is in your hands on PC - PlayStation 4/5 - Xbox One/Series X - Nintendo Switch

Remember to add the game to your wishlist https://bit.ly/3ntwYZe

Musique: “Grave Digger”- (Blues Saraceno) - (P)&(C) The Extreme Music Library Ltd
With the authorisation of Extreme Music France

Until then, follow The Forgotten City on :
✔️ Twitter: ModnStoryteller
✔️ Steam: https://bit.ly/3ntwYZe
✔️ Facebook: Modern Storyteller - The Forgotten City

Follow Dear Villagers: ​
✔️ On Facebook: http://bit.ly/3iPimSi​ ​
✔️ On Twitter: https://bit.ly/2KvRrOF​ ​
✔️ On Steam: https://bit.ly/3nJjrg9​
✔️ On Discord: https://bit.ly/3pjAExG
